text: The Latvian Football Federation (Latvian: Latvijas Futbola federƒÅcija) is the main association football body in Latvia. It was founded 19 June 1921. It joined FIFA and UEFA a year later. It organises the Latvian Higher League, Latvian First League, Latvian Second League, the lower divisions and the Latvian Football Cup. It controls the Latvia national football team and Latvia women's national football team. == Other websites == *Official Website Category:1921 establishments in Europe Category:1920s establishments in Latvia Category:Organizations based in Latvia Category:Sport in Latvia Category:Association football governing bodies in Europe
title: Latvian Football Federation
